name: Hampton by Hilton Poznan Old Town
description: When you arrive at Hampton by Hilton Poznan Old Town, you’ll appreciate the hotel’s excellent location in the center of Poznan business district, close to offices and the International Fair headquarters. The hotel is also just steps from the Old Market Square, the Town Hall, Poznan Grand Theatre plus local shopping and dining. Poznan Glówny railway station is within walking distance from the hotel. Our Poznan hotel includes 117 modern guest rooms equipped with free WiFi, a comfy bed, ergonomic workspace, a 42-inch LCD TV with satellite channels and coffee/tea making facilities. Accessible rooms are also available that include all the standard amenities plus extra features for your comfort. Wake up each morning to our free hot breakfast, included in your stay at our Poznan Old Town hotel. Meet up with colleagues, friends or family at our onsite restaurant, offering a unique atmosphere and delicious menu based on local dishes for lunch and dinner. If you’re in a hurry, stop by the 24/7 hub offering drinks, snacks and travel essentials. Unwind and socialize in our spacious lobby with a six-meter bio fireplace, or make use of our free business center. Keep up you exercise routine at the 24-hour fitness center with modern equipment. Hampton by Hilton Poznan Old Town offers 55 sq. m. of customizable meeting space equipped with modern audio/visual equipment, ideal for smaller business and social meetings.Hilton

name: NH Poznan
description: Housed in a 100-year-old building, the NH Poznan hotel sits within the city’s main shopping district. Only a short walk from the hotel, guests will find the Poznan International Fair, the historic Old Market, the National Museum, and the train station for access to surrounding attractions. NH Poznan has 93 rooms which have each been designed in a contemporary style with neutral shades of grey and brown. Every room comes with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV allowing guests to stay connected during their travels. Some of the rooms come with a sofa for extra space to relax, while others have a balcony with lovely views of the city. Connecting rooms are also available and are perfect for families and large groups. Every morning, we serve a delicious breakfast complete with a variety of sweet and savory options. These include cold cuts, cheeses, fresh pastries and bread, accompanied by coffee, tea, and juices. Our stylish restaurant offers an innovative international menu which you can enjoy for lunch or dinner. For something more casual, guests can unwind with a drink at our lobby bar. You can work out at the gym and afterwards relax at the wellness area with a Turkish bath and a Finnish Sauna. There are also six meeting rooms on site.NH Hoteles

name: Don Prestige Residence
description: The Don Prestige Residence is located in central Poznań, just 400 metres from the Old Town Square. All its modern rooms come with free Wi-Fi. All rooms and suites at Don Prestige are spacious and bright. Each has a comfortable seating area with either a sofa or armchairs. There is a complementary bottle of mineral water in the rooms. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the Shades bar. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange laundry service. Fitness room, luggage storage and safe boxes are also available free of charge. Don Prestige Residence is situated within a 5-minute walk from Stary Browar Shopping, Arts and Business Centre and the Imperial Castle. Poznań International Fair is just 1.5 kilometres away.

name: City Park Hotel & Residence
description: City Park Hotel & Residence is a high-class facility offering 35 hotel rooms and 53 spacious apartments for long-term stays with free high-speed internet access and a fully equipped kitchenette for short and long-term stays. City Park Hotel & Residence is located 1 km from the Poznań International Fair and 220 meters from the Hala Arena. The hotel offers access to wellness facilities, the CUCINA Restaurant and the Whiskey Bar 88. At the premises of City Park Poznań Guests can enjoy access to the Browar Restauracyjny restaurant and the Cappuccina cafe. All luxurious City Park rooms and suites come with a 40-inch LCD TV and a work desk. Each room has a comfortable seating area and an elegant bathroom with a bath. All are air-conditioned and soundproofed. Suites offer a fully equipped kitchenette. Guests can enjoy a meal at the Cucina restaurant, awarded by the Gault&Millau guide, or try one of 2000 types of whisky at the Whisky Bar 88. The hotel features a swimming pool, a steam and dry sauna, a salt cave and a massage parlour. City Park Hotel & Residence is situated 3 km from the Old Town Square and about 2 kilometres from Stary Browar Shopping and Art Centre.

name: ibis Poznan Centrum
description: No description found

name: Ilonn Boutique Limanowskiego
description: Located in the historic Łazarz district of Poznań, Ilonn Boutique Limanowskiego is 500 metres from Poznań Palm House. Poznan International Fair is 1.2 km from the property and Poznań Główny Train Station is 1.1 km away. This unique, boutique accommodation features a historic tenement house style with business facilities. The apartments are air conditioned and come with a satellite flat-screen TV. Some units feature a dining area. There is also a kitchenette, fitted with a refrigerator. Each unit is fitted with a private bathroom with bath robes and slippers. The aparthotel features free WiFi throughout the property. Philharmonic is 1.8 km from Ilonn Boutique Limanowskiego and it is 300 metres to Wilson Park. The nearest airport is Ławica Airport, 5 km from the property.

name: Puro Poznan Stare Miasto
description: Located in the heart of Poznań 250 metres from the Old Market Square, PURO Poznań Old Town offers a restaurant with an open-air terrace garden, as well as a fitness centre. Modern, air-conditioned rooms here feature free WiFi, as well as a package of free minutes for domestic and international phonecalls. Each room comes with a tablet, which can be used as a remote for lighting, TV and climate control. Rooms here will provide you with a multimedia TV with satellite channels and video on demand. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with underfloor heating a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras includes a mini fridge. Complementary bottled water is provided. At PURO Poznań Old Town you will find a free sauna. You can also relax at the summer sun terrace. There is also a 24-hour front desk. Activities in the surrounding area include cycling, on free bikes available depending on availability, and sightseeing. In the lobby there is a vending machine with coffee and hot chocolate, available free of charge. In the lobby guests also enjoy complementary access to a TV and tablets. Playstation 4 games consoles can be rented, subject to availability. Poznan Lawica Airport is located 7,8 km from the property, Poznań Główny Train Station is 2,2 km away and it is 1,2 km to Stary Browar Shopping Center. Poznań International Trade Fair is 2,4 km away. The property is 300 metres from City Hall and 550 metres from National Museum.

name: Hotel Liberte 33, BW Premier Collection
description: The Hotel Liberte 33, BW Premier Collection is located in the center of Poznan, close to the railway station and the Poznan International Fair. You can reach the hotel within a walking distance from the Old Town Square, which is the most important point on the tourist map of Poznan. The hotel is located in the 'green' part of the city, very close to the Grand Theatre. The Hotel Liberte 33, BW Premier Collection consists of two buildings: a historic villa and a modern outbuilding that offers a total of 60 air-conditioned 4 Star standard rooms, with the access to free Wi-Fi. Guests can enjoy the original interiors of the villa and the modern space in the new part of the building. There are also a sauna and fitness facilities. Business or family meeting can be arranged in one of the two meeting rooms. We offer a full range of dining services, from the menu at L33 Bistro & Bar, to the choice of drinks at Gin Bar to the wide selection of wines at the Wine Bar – Foodwine. In all of these places you can spend time with friends and family or make an appointment for a business meeting. You can also have lunch, coffee or a glass of good wine. Hotel Liberte 33 guarantees its guests a unique experience consisting of: excellent service, cozy interiors, great cuisine. Deposit & Pre-Authorisation: Please note that the Hotel reserves the right to pre-authorize the booker’s credit card 24 hours prior to arrival for the full amount of the stay plus PLN200 per room for any incidentals that might occur. For prepaid bookings, the Hotel reserves the right to either collect cash deposit or request for pre-authorization upon check-in for any incidentals.”bestwestern.com

name: Novotel Poznan Centrum
description: No description found

name: Sheraton Poznan Hotel
description: Sheraton Poznan Hotel is a five star hotel located in the center of the dynamic city of Poznan. The hotel features 180 newly remodeled rooms including 13 apartments. Every room is equipped with individually controlled air conditioning and a luxurious Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience Bed designed especially for the Sheraton brand. Room facilities include a safe an LCD TV with cable channels and an ergonomic work area with high speed internet access. The exclusive Club Floor houses luxurious rooms with panoramic views of Poznan. Guests of these rooms enjoy access to the exclusive renovated Club Lounge. Guests can use many leisure facilities that Sheraton Poznan Hotel provides. They include a heated indoor swimming pool, a fitness center and a sauna. Sheraton has two restaurants and serves a varied breakfast buffet in the morning.Marriott

name: Hotel Desilva Premium Poznan
description: Situated in the Stare Miasto District district in Poznań, just 2 km from the Poznań International Fair, Hotel DeSilva Premium Poznań is air-conditioned and features free WiFi access. The property offers paid private parking and an on-site bar. Each room at DeSilva Premium Poznań is air-conditioned and features a flat-screen TV, as well as tea/coffee making facilities. Extras include a fridge with 2 bottles of water. The rooms additionally come with a wardrobe and a safe. The private bathroom comes equipped with free toiletries and a hairdryer. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property, as well as an à-la-carte restaurant specialising in Polish and Mediterranean cuisine. There are also 5 conference rooms with a total size of 200 square metres. Stary Browar is 400 metres from Hotel DeSilva Premium Poznań, while National Museum is 400 metres away. The nearest airport is Poznan Lawica Airport, 7 km from Hotel DeSilva Premium Poznań.

name: Focus Hotel Poznan
description: Located in Poznań, 1.6 km from St. Stanislaus the Bishop Church, Focus Hotel Poznań provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a business centre. Philharmonic is 2.6 km away and Royal Castle is 2.9 km from the hotel. The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at Focus Hotel Poznań also offer free WiFi, while selected rooms are fitted with a city view. Guest rooms at the accommodation include air conditioning and a desk. A buffet, continental or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At Focus Hotel Poznań guests are welcome to take advantage of a sauna. City Hall is 1.8 km from the hotel, while Stary Browar is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is Poznań-Ławica Henryk Wieniawski Airport, 11 km from Focus Hotel Poznań.

name: Hotel Mercure Poznan Centrum
description: The 4-star Mercure Poznan Centrum is located in the business area of Poznan, next to the fair grounds and within walking distance to the Old market Square. Just 15 minutes drive from the international airport and 5 minutes walk from the main train station. Enjoy our excellent conference facilities, WINESTONE Restaurant and the hotel`s own pastry shop. The hotel has 228 air-conditioned rooms with free WIFI, fitness center,sauna and large car park.accorhotels.com

name: Moxy Poznan Airport
description: Moxy Poznan Airport is for play: glorious design of communal space, food, snacks and drinks available 24/7, compact rooms that feel spacious thanks to the ingenious design. From the very first steps you will feel warm welcome from our friendly crew, who will greet you with arms wide open and Moxy welcome drink. Thanks to the unbeatable location just opposite to the airport you will never miss your flight. If you decide to explore the city with your friends, Poznan’s major attractions are easily accessible by public transport or by taxi – just a 20 minutes’ drive to the city center. Our 120 cozy rooms with a space-age TVs, furiously fast Wi-Fi, world renown Marriott plush queen beds and bathrooms with fancy Aussie cosmetics will become the center of where you relax after socializing in our communal space. At our lobby, bustling with music, you can chill out with friends, have a drink or grab a yummy warm flatbread any time of the day or night, because our bar and our crew is always awaiting you.Marriott

name: Ilonn Hotel
description: Ilonn Hotel is an eco-friendly hotel located within 20-minute drive from Poznan Old Town. It features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and satellite LCD TVs. Free parking is provided on site. All spacious rooms in Ilonn have an ergonomic work space, a telephone, a safety deposit box and ironing facilities. Each has a private bathroom with high-quality toiletries and a hairdryer. A free bottle of mineral water is included. Buffet breakfast is served daily in the Ilonn Hotel Restaurant, which specialises in traditional Polish and Italian dishes. Polish and Mediterranean dished can be enjoyed at the on-site Gusto Food & Wine Restaurant. Guests can spend time in a Ilonn Hotel’s quality sauna free of charge for 45 minutes. Front desk staff can arrange for laundry and ironing services. A modern conference centre and a gym are also available. There is also an option to arrange for a monitored, gated parking nearby at extra charge. Ilonn Hotel is situated only 4 kilometres from Plaza and Pestka shopping centres with a selection of shops, dining opportunities and a cinema. There are cycling trails nearby.

name: Hotel Moderno
description: Located 1.2 km from the Main Train Station, Hotel Moderno Poznań in Poznań offers modern, elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi and a 40-inch flat-screen TV. There is a 24-hour front desk service. Each room at the Moderno includes a bright bathroom with shower and free toiletries. There are also slippers and a hairdryer. The Steak & Grill restaurant serves cuisine of the world, along with a breakfast buffet. A variety of hot and cold drinks can be enjoyed in the bar. The restaurant specialises in steaks. Hotel Moderno Poznań is situated 1.2 km from the Poznań International Fair and 3.8 km from the City Football Stadium. The city centre is a 7-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Altus Poznan Old Town
description: Located in Poznań, 700 metres from Stary Browar, Hotel Altus Poznań Old Town provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 500 metres from Philharmonic, and within 400 metres of the city centre. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room is equipped with a safety deposit box and some rooms will provide you with city views. All units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and Full English/Irish options. Popular points of interest near Hotel Altus Poznań Old Town include Poznań Grand Theatre, St. Stanislaus the Bishop Church and Central Railway Station Poznan. The nearest airport is Poznań-Ławica Henryk Wieniawski Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Grand Royal Hotel
description: The 4-star Grand Royal Hotel is located in a quiet area of Poznań, a 2-minute drive from A2 motorway. Guests enjoy free access to an indoor swimming pool, a sauna and a gym. All rooms at Grand Royal Hotel spacious and come with tea and coffee making facilities and an LCD TV with satellite channels. The hotel's restaurant, Finezja, specialises in Polish and Mediterranean dishes. Guest can also relax at the Lounge Bar, where they can try a selection of coffees or alcoholic beverages. On sunny days they are welcome to rest in the winter garden. The winter garden and the bar feature 90" LED TVs which air sports and other events. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day. Laundry and ironing services are provided. Grand Royal Hotel is located only 5.5 km away from the Poznań International Fair and Poznań Główny Railway Station.

name: Andersia Hotel & Spa Poznan, a member of Radisson Individuals
description: Andersia Hotel is a design hotel, located by the Stary Browar Shopping Centre in central Poznań, just a 10-minute walk from Poznań International Fair. The rooms feature glass-covered bathrooms with floor heating and free Wi-Fi. Buffet breakfast is served daily in the hotel restaurant, Flavoria. In the evenings Flavoria specialises in Polish and international dishes. Andersia’s Lobby Bar serves a selection of wine and drinks. Room service is available. All rooms in the Andersia Hotel come with air conditioning and a safe. There are tea and coffee making facilities, as well as a free minibar with mineral water, sodas and juice. Extras include a comfortable chaise-lounge with a table in each room. All rooms are soundproofed. Guests can relax in a sauna or work out in a well-equipped fitness centre. Andersia Hotel is situated just 1km from the Imperial Castle in Poznań and vis-à-vis a shopping, art and business centre of Stary Browar. Please note that due to the necessary modernization, the Wellness area and the swimming pool will be closed since 31st of January until further notice.

name: Platinum Palace Residence Boutique Hotel
description: Platinum Residence Boutique is located in a quiet area of central Poznań, 1 km from Poznań International Fair. This 4-star boutique hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The modern rooms at the Platinum Residence Boutique are fitted with a plasma TV with satellite channels. All feature a laptop safe and a minibar. The bathroom includes toiletries and a bathrobe. A free bottle of mineral water is offered. Platinum Residence Boutique houses Reymonta 19 the restaurant serving modern Polish dishes. Guests are also welcome to visit the Purple Bar and the winter garden. The Platinum Residence Boutique is situated 1 km from the Poznań Główny Railway Station. The Ławica Airport is within a 10-minute drive away from the property and the City Football Stadium is a 5-minute drive away. 10% discount is offered in the restaurant.

name: Saint Martin Residence by Y3 Hotels - Poznan Old Town with Wellness
description: No description found

name: Novotel Poznan Malta
description: Novotel Poznan Malta is located in attractive green area, near Termy Maltanskie, about 2.5 km from Old Market Square. Bicycles can be rented at hotel for tours around Lake Malta. The hotel garden, outdoor swimming pool available July to August and fitness studio will enrich your time. Parents will appreciate special place for kids. We offer spacious rooms with free WiFi and tea and coffee facilities.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Vivaldi
description: Vivaldi Hotel is located in a quiet area in the centre of Poznan, next to Cytadela Park. It features air-conditioned rooms with bathrooms and satellite TV. There is free Wi-Fi. Each spacious room in this 4-star hotel comes with a work desk and a seating area. A private bathroom features a hairdryer. Vivaldi's restaurant, Cztery Pory Roku (Four Seasons), specialises in Italian and international dishes. There is also a small café offering coffee and desserts. It takes a 20-minute walk to get to Poznan Old Town and the Main Old Town Square.

name: Hotel Fairplayce
description: 3-star Hotel FairPlayce is a part of a sports centre located in Naramowice neighbourhood in Poznań. The property features a restaurant and bar. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and free private parking is available on site. Each room is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. There is also a private safe, a work desk, a fridge and a kettle with a welcome set. Guests have access to a 24-hour reception and different sports facilities: tennis, squash and badminton courts and table tennis tables, as well as a modern fitness centre with a gym and a wellness salon offering health and relaxation massages. Both City Hall and Royal Castle are located 6 km away from Hotel FairPlayce. It is 6 km to the Main Square. Adam Mickiewicz University Campus is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Ławica Airport, 10 km from the property.
